Parameters.Name: PTZ HOME POSITION OPERATIONS USING CUSTOM MEDIA2 PROFILE

Test.TestName: FEATURES
Test.Name: Features for testing that data is received fron node
Test.Description:
GetCapabilities: supported Scope list contains onvif://www.onvif.org/Profile/Streaming Discovery feature: supported Discovery/Types/dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter feature: supported WS-Basic notification: supporetd NTP: Supported WS-Username token: supported MediaService: supported Real-Time Streaming feature: supported
!!! Before this test case make sure that DUT has dn:NetworkVideoTransmitter discovery type !!!

Test.TestName: PTZ HOME POSITION OPERATIONS USING CUSTOM MEDIA2 PROFILE
Test.Name: 1 node; A.15; A.16; continuousPanTilt and continuousZoom = true; fixedHomePosition := false

tcr:ProfileCapabilities.ConfigurationsSupported: VideoSource VideoEncoder AudioSource AudioEncoder Metadata Analytics AudioOutput PTZ
